# animates

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the framework animates the annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
get animates(): boolean;
set animates(value: boolean);
```

## Discussion

When this property is `true`, MapKit JS animates the appearance of the annotation on the map. You’re responsible for implementing an animation using the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Annotation/appearanceAnimation] property.

The annotation doesn’t animate when:

- You don’t provide an animation in [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Annotation/appearanceAnimation].
- The [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Annotation/animates] property is `false.`

## Getting and setting interaction behavior

- **draggable**: A Boolean value that determines whether the user can drag the annotation.
- **selected**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the map shows the annotation in a selected state.
- **enabled**: A Boolean value that determines whether the annotation responds to user interaction.
